perturbation.original_text:
1.3 "Research Quantities" means, in the case of nanomaterials and coated nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders of 54 kilograms or less, and, in the case of dispersions of nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders of 60 kilograms or less.

1.4 "Commercial Quantities" means in the case of nanomaterials and coated nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders greater than 54 kilograms, and, in the case of dispersions of nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders greater than 60 kilograms.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.3 "Research Quantities" means, in the case of nanomaterials and coated nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders of 54 kilograms or less, and, in the case of dispersions of nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders of 60 kilograms or less.

1.4 "Commercial Quantities" means in the case of nanomaterials and coated nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders greater than 50 kilograms, and, in the case of dispersions of nanomaterials, quantities purchased and distributed in individual orders greater than 55 kilograms.
perturbation.explanation: The definitions of "Research Quantities" and "Commercial Quantities" are now conflicting. Initially, the thresholds were 54kg/60kg for nanomaterials/dispersions respectively. This modification changes the commercial quantities definition to greater than 50kg/55kg for nanomaterials/dispersions respectively. This creates a contradiction: an order of 52kg of nanomaterials could be argued as either research or commercial quantities, depending on which definition is referenced, thus creating uncertainty about the applicable pricing, distribution rights and other obligations.

perturbation.original_text: 5.1 Return Rights. Subject to the protocol described below, ALFA AESAR shall have the right to return at NTC's expense, and for full credit of ALFA AESAR's cost, any Products (i.) for which a legitimate and credible allegation is made that the use of such Products infringes on any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, right of privacy or publicity, or any other tangible or intangible proprietary or intellectual property right; (b) that are not manufactured, packaged, or labeled in accordance with specifications or industry standards; (c) that are shipped in error or in non-conformance with ALFA AESAR's purchase order; or (d) that are damaged or defective. In the event that ALFA AESAR believes that it is entitled to return any Products delivered under this Agreement, the parties will adhere to the following protocol: (w) ALFA AESAR will contact NTC's Quality Director and then forward to the Quality Director, via a carrier selected by and at NTC's expense, a sample of the Product that ALFA AESAR believes is non-conforming; (x) upon receipt of the sample, NTC will test it and then notify ALFA AESAR of the test results; (y) where the test results confirm that the sample is non-conforming, NTC will provide ALFA AESAR with NTC's Return Authorization Number ("RAN"); and (z) any returned non-conforming Product must be in its original container, with original labels in act, and all paperwork concerning the returned Product must include NTC's RAN.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1 Return Rights. Subject to the protocol described below, ALFA AESAR shall have the right to return at NTC's expense, and for full credit of ALFA AESAR's cost, any Products (i.) for which a legitimate and credible allegation is made that the use of such Products infringes on any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, right of privacy or publicity, or any other tangible or intangible proprietary or intellectual property right; (b) that are not manufactured, packaged, or labeled in accordance with specifications or industry standards; (c) that are shipped in error or in non-conformance with ALFA AESAR's purchase order; or (d) that are damaged or defective. In the event that ALFA AESAR believes that it is entitled to return any Products delivered under this Agreement, the parties will adhere to the following protocol: (w) ALFA AESAR will contact NTC's Quality Director and then forward to the Quality Director, via a carrier selected by and at ALFA AESAR's expense, a sample of the Product that ALFA AESAR believes is non-conforming; (x) upon receipt of the sample, NTC will test it and then notify ALFA AESAR of the test results; (y) where the test results confirm that the sample is non-conforming, NTC will provide ALFA AESAR with NTC's Return Authorization Number ("RAN"); and (z) any returned non-conforming Product must be in its original container, with original labels in act, and all paperwork concerning the returned Product must include NTC's RAN.
perturbation.explanation: The original text in Section 5.1 states that ALFA AESAR will return the sample of the product to the Quality Director at NTC's expense. This modification changes the text to say that ALFA AESAR will return the sample to the Quality Director at ALFA AESAR's expense, directly contradicting the initial phrase, and creating uncertainty as to who bears the shipping costs for returned products.

perturbation.original_text: 7.5 Upon termination of this Agreement, ALFA AESAR may continue to advertise and promote the Products, using the NTC's Trademarks and NTC content until ALFA AESAR's inventory depletion.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.5 Upon termination of this Agreement, ALFA AESAR may not continue to advertise and promote the Products, using the NTC's Trademarks and NTC content, and they are required to cease all promotion of products immediately.
perturbation.explanation: The modification contradicts the original text regarding Trademark usage after termination. Originally ALFA AESAR could continue advertising products utilizing NTC's trademarks until their inventory was depleted. However, after this modification they are prohibited from doing so, thus providing an in-text contradiction about advertising after termination.
